body_html:
Hey, progress! I downgraded to NumPy 1.8.2 and the issue is no longer there.

So now the problem seems to be either:

  • Something about import_array1() broke between NP1.8 and NP1.11
  • OR, the sysadmins on my system have installed an older copy of numpy with headers in /usr/include, etc. The build process could be picking up those instead, and causing some gross conflict somewhere.

I'm investigating each of these.

body:
Hey, progress! I downgraded to NumPy 1.8.2 and the issue is no longer there.

So now the problem seems to be either:
- Something about import_array1() broke between NP1.8 and NP1.11
- OR, the sysadmins on my system have installed an older copy of numpy with headers in /usr/include, etc. The build process could be picking up those instead, and causing some gross conflict somewhere.

I'm investigating each of these.
